description: Adds or updates the list of authorized targets for an IAM Identity Center access scope for an application.

parameters.name: Scope
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the access scope to be associated with the specified targets.

parameters.name: AuthorizedTargets
parameters.description: Specifies an array list of ARNs that represent the authorized targets for this access scope. (string) ---

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application with the access scope with the targets to add or update.
